title: Market Update 1: What to Watch
author: Agent 4 McKenzie
excerpt: This week we break down pricing trends, inventory, and mortgage rates in the Lower Mainland.
content: Welcome to our weekly look at the market. Prices remain steady while inventory shifts seasonally.
For buyers, competition varies by neighborhood. Detached homes show different trends than condos.
As always, talk to an experienced local agent before making big decisions.
